resources.string: It is a period of civil wars\\n in the galaxy. A brave alliance\\n of underground freedom fighters \\n has challenged the tyranny and \\n oppression of the awesome \\n GALACTIC EMPIRE.\\n \\n\\n Striking from a fortress hidden \\n among the billion stars of \\n the galaxy, rebel spaceships have \\n won their first victory in a battle \\n with the powerful Imperial Starfleet. \\n The EMPIRE fears that another defeat \\n could bring a thousand more solar \\n systems into the rebellion, and \\n Imperial control over the galaxy \\n would be lost forever.\\n \\n\\n To crush the rebellion once and \\n for all, the EMPIRE is \\n constructing a sinister \\n new battle station. \\n Powerful enough to destroy an \\n entire planet, its completion \\n spells certain doom for the \\n champions of freedom.\\n
